00054 template<typename T, typename Allocator = allocator<T> >
00055   class vector
00056     : public thrust::detail::vector_base<T,Allocator>
00057 {
00060   private:
00061     typedef thrust::detail::vector_base<T,Allocator> super_t;
00065   public:
00066 
00069     typedef typename super_t::size_type  size_type;
00070     typedef typename super_t::value_type value_type;
00076     vector();
00077 
00082     explicit vector(size_type n, const value_type &value = value_type());
00083 
00087     vector(const vector &x);
00088 
00092     template<typename OtherT, typename OtherAllocator>
00093     vector(const thrust::detail::vector_base<OtherT,OtherAllocator> &x);
00094 
00098     template<typename OtherT, typename OtherAllocator>
00099     vector(const std::vector<OtherT,OtherAllocator> &x);
00100 
00105     template<typename InputIterator>
00106     vector(InputIterator first, InputIterator last);
00107 
00108     // XXX vector_base should take a Derived type so we don't have to define these superfluous assigns
00109 
00114     template<typename OtherT, typename OtherAllocator>
00115     vector &operator=(const std::vector<OtherT,OtherAllocator> &x);
00116 
00121     template<typename OtherT, typename OtherAllocator>
00122     vector &operator=(const thrust::detail::vector_base<OtherT,OtherAllocator> &x);
00123 }; // end vector
